Comments_List: Learned about Matroids, many cryptomorphic definitions and interesting applications to other fields of math
It was a good course. Not sure about the specifics.

This course is probably a one-off, but if it is ever offered again, would recommend matroids. Subject matter leans mostly towards combinatorics and linear algebra, so if you like those, take this one. Max obviously put good work into designing the class, lectures, and problem sets.
Yeah, it was certainly interesting, and probably useful.
Yes. Matroids are a very interesting subject. Max is a great lecturer and you'll learn a lot.
